text:
#Market News February 12, 2018 / 2:11 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Barrow, Hanley, Mewhinney & Strauss, Llc Reports 5.68 Percent Passive Stake In Cardinal Health Inc As Of December 31, 2017 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Barrow, Hanley, Mewhinney & Strauss, LLC: 
* BARROW, HANLEY, MEWHINNEY & STRAUSS, LLC REPORTS 5.68 PERCENT PASSIVE STAKE IN CARDINAL HEALTH INC AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 - SEC FILING‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2CfIHSC ) Further company coverage:
